005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDateTimeItem;
014
015import java.util.List;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018
019/**
020 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
021 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-current-dateTime">fn:current-dateTime</a>
022 * function.
023 */
024public final class FnCurrentDateTime {
025  @NonNull
026  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
027      .name("current-dateTime")
028      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
029      .deterministic()
030      .contextDependent()
031      .focusIndependent()
032      .returnType(IDateTimeItem.class)
033      .returnOne()
034      .functionHandler(FnCurrentDateTime::execute)
035      .build();
036
037  private FnCurrentDateTime() {
038    // disable construction
039  }
040
041  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
042  @NonNull
043  private static ISequence<IDateTimeItem> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
044      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
045      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
046      IItem focus) {
047    return ISequence.of(fnCurrentDateTime(dynamicContext));
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Implements <a href=
052   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-current-dateTime">fn:current-dateTime</a>.
053   *
054   * @param dynamicContext
055   *          the dynamic evaluation context
056   * @return the current date
057   */
058  @NonNull
059  public static IDateTimeItem fnCurrentDateTime(@NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
060    return IDateTimeItem.valueOf(dynamicContext.getCurrentDateTime());
061  }
062}
